title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Artifact of the Month
body: Artifact of the Month         Military seal ring of Battery D NPS Photo  Military Ring  Military seal ring of Battery D, 129th Field Artillery, National Guard.  After being promoted to captain, Truman took command of Battery D on July 11, 1918. The unit had such a bad reputation that Truman admitted years later that he was so scared the first time he spoke to the unit, he couldn't say a word. The men of Battery D came to respect Truman through his fair and even-handed leadership. They later became his greatest political supporters after the war.                           Previous Artifacts of the Month   22 Photos  Previous Artifacts of the Month.
